knimeNode.name: ARFF Writer
knimeNode.shortDescription: Writes data into a file in ARFF format.

fullDescription.intro: This node saves data to a file in ARFF format. In the configuration dialog, specify a valid destination file. When executed, the node writes the data, coming through its input port, into the specified location. At this point in time, it only writes not-sparse ARFF files (i.e. it always writes out all data, even if its value is zero).
fullDescription.option: Choose the file to write to.
If unchecked, the node refuses to execute when the output file exists (prevent unintentional overwrite).

ports.inPort: The datatable to be written to the file
